sentences.sContent: They should not be set at or above the availability standards.
sentences.sContent_eng: They should not be set at or above the availability standards.
sentences.sCn: 它们不应该设置为等于或高于这些可用性标准。

sentences.sContent: You will then be ready to calculate its overall availability, as above.
sentences.sContent_eng: You will then be ready to calculate its overall availability, as above.
sentences.sCn: 然后您将准备计算它的整体可用性，如上所述。

sentences.sContent: In an on demand shop, business users do not want to encounter lack of availability or failure in their applications' accessing this data.
sentences.sContent_eng: In an on demand shop, business users do not want to encounter lack of availability or failure in their applications' accessing this data.
sentences.sCn: 在随需应变的企业，业务用户不希望在其应用程序访问此数据时遇到缺乏可用性或发生故障的情况。

phrases.pCn: 水有效性；水资源可利用量

words.tran: 有效的，可得的；可利用的；空闲的
